jd: From: Roshani, vyze inc roshani@vyzeinc.com Reply to: roshani@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Tittle: .Net Full Stack DeveloperVisa: USC onlyLocation: NEW YORK - 750 Seventh Ave- NYLocation: Hybrid - with onsite travel to NYC office.Eligibility: Must be US Citizen ONLY - (Due to previous issues, eligibility will be verified)INTERVIEW Interview Process: WebEx interviews followed by a mandatory face-to-face interviewLinkedin Must Job Description:We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our team, focusing on developing and testing a loosely coupled, event-driven architecture platform with a strong emphasis on data and resiliency. The role will primarily involve developing services and automation testing, with occasional work on various UI technologies.Key Responsibilities:Develop and test C# services and applications (preferably with .Net Core and Kubernetes).Build web API services using JSON and ASP.NET Core.Develop backend message processing services utilizing C# and message queuing systems such as Service Bus, MQ Series, and Kafka.Implement services querying Elastic Search.Define and build API tests for web services (4+ years), using tools like JMeter and Visual Studio Test.Develop user experiences using modern web frameworks (e.g., React), Windows platforms (WPF/UWP), and/or iOS applications with Xamarin.Build and execute performance tests for web/mobile applications (4+ years), utilizing JMeter.Develop automated regression test suites using tools such as Selenium, SpecFlow for BDD, JMeter, and Visual Studio unit tests.Collaborate within a small agile team developing applications, services, and automated tests that will be utilized across multiple devices.Required Skills & Experience:.Net Core C# development experience.Expertise in building JSON-based APIs using C#.Experience querying Elastic Search.Proficiency with JMeter.Experience with SpecFlow as a tool for Behavior Driven Development (BDD).DevOps experience, preferably with Azure DevOps.Experience working in teams using CI/CD pipelines with automated testing.5+ years of relevant experience.Nice to Have:Virtualization and containerization experience with Docker and Kubernetes.Experience creating CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps.Cloud experience, particularly with Azure.Developing Kafka message consumers and producers.Experience with Elastic APM and Kibana.RegardsRoshaniroshani@vyzeinc.com
